entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:41 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 5:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow near midnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
